title: Pitch Components
shortDescription: Custom Shopify Architecture for a Performance-Driven Brand

section1.heading: pitchcomponents.com
section1.text:
A fully customized Shopify build designed to elevate a high-performance niche brand into a scalable global e-commerce platform.
Pitch Components engineers lightweight jetski components for elite freestyle and race athletes. The objective was clear: transform a functional webshop into a brand-driven commerce experience that communicates precision, performance, and credibility at every touchpoint.

section3.heading: Heading 3
section3.text1: Rather than a rigid theme, the site was designed and developed as a custom Webflow system built around reusable, editable components.
list: Custom template components – built modularly for maximum flexibility
Client-friendly content structure – easily updated without developer support
Responsive layouts with attention to motion, spacing and brand personality
Semantic, clean CSS & class structure for consistency and scalability
section3.text2: Every section was crafted to be both a design expression and a reusable asset the client can leverage across pages.

title: Escea Fireplaces Ambe Brand
shortDescription: Webflow Rebuild – From WordPress to Creative Freedom

section1.heading: Ambehome.com
section1.text: We migrated AmbeHome from a restrictive WordPress setup to a fully custom Webflow experience — combining platform stability with complete visual flexibility.

section2.heading: Why Webflow?
section2.text:
WordPress had become a constraint: plugin issues, limited design control, and ongoing maintenance challenges.
Webflow was chosen for:
Enhanced stability & performance
Visual design freedom with production-ready output
No reliance on third-party plugins
Future-proof content control for the client
The result is a site that’s both visually compelling and technically robust.
